person.persName: S. Berkley May (Spencer County, Kentucky, farmer, delegate, and justice of the peace)

body.p: Spencer County, Kentucky, farmer, delegate, and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah May. Father of Catherine May. Delegate to the Kentucky Democratic Party Convention from Spencer County in 1858. Farmer in Spencer County in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Spencer County in 1864.
